casebody.data:
In re: Gutowski 280P15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Mr. Michael D. Gutowski, Waxhaw, Pro Se. Ms. Mary Anne Gutowski, Pro Se. Ms. Emily F. Lowder, Mr. Michael T. Hosmer, Mr. Jeremy B. Wilkins, Attorneys at Law, For Bank of America, N.A.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of August 2015 by Respondents for Stay in Light of Bankruptcy Filing:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
